ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | zlmodzxz.z | |- Z = ( ZZring freeLMod { 0 , 1 } ) |
| 2 |  | #P_zringring | |- ZZring e. Ring |
| 3 |  | #P_prex | |- { 0 , 1 } e. _V |
| 4 | 1 | #P_frlmlmod | |- ( ( ZZring e. Ring /\ { 0 , 1 } e. _V ) -> Z e. LMod ) |
| 5 | 2, 3, 4 | #P_mp2an | |- Z e. LMod |
| 6 | 1 | #P_frlmsca | |- ( ( ZZring e. Ring /\ { 0 , 1 } e. _V ) -> ZZring = ( Scalar ` Z ) ) |
| 7 | 2, 3, 6 | #P_mp2an | |- ZZring = ( Scalar ` Z ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_pm3.2i | |- ( Z e. LMod /\ ZZring = ( Scalar ` Z ) ) |
